text: Jere Mikael Pöyhönen (born 21 October 1993), known by his stage name Käärijä, is a Finnish rapper and singer. In 2023, he represented Finland in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song "Cha Cha Cha". He came 4th in the jury vote and 1st in the public vote, but finished second overall, with Swedish entry Loreen winning. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Title Details Peak chart positions FIN
